metadata.title: USN-6942-1 -- Gross vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that Gross incorrectly handled memory when composing log entries. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause Gross to crash, resulting in a denial of service, or possibly execute arbitrary code.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6942-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  gross - 1.0.2-4ubuntu0.18.04.1~esm1 Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro
